page.title: 01VILLAGE SHOP & P.O.Cliffsend
page.content:
The village shop is situated in the middle of the lower end of the village. The shop sells a great variety of goods. {Some of the typical prices:} Apples 44p lb Oranges 22p each (large) Light Bulbs 35 & 45 each Drinks 30p can 49p bottle 5ltr Bread 35p (45p sliced) Sweets 36p quarter Candles 43p pack of six Glue 40p & 70p tubes String 30p a ball
Frozen foods and fresh cakes are sold. Also in the shop there is a notice board for local advertisements The shop and Sub Post Office is run by the owner and his wife. Most people find the shop and P.O. invaluable especially the elderly.
